text: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يُوعَدُونَ

translation.en: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised
translation.id: pandangan mereka tertunduk ke bawah diliputi kehinaan. Itulah hari yang diancamkan kepada mereka
